http://news.sky.com/story/climate-change.title: Climate change promises fall short and risk 'destabilised world and endless suffering', UN says
http://news.sky.com/story/climate-change.description: The latest global climate promises to cut emissions are not yet enough to stay under the dangerous threshold of global heating that would trigger severe climate breakdown, UN scientists have warned.
